description.translate: Seeing her, many are the warriors who took their legs around their necks.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Concasseur d'os\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7En la voyant, nombreux sont les guerriers\"}","{\"text\":\"§7qui ont pris leurs jambes à leur cou.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Seeing her, many are the warriors\"}","{\"text\":\"§7who took their legs around their necks.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
